description: The Nike Vaporfly shoes can make you |4%| faster
Eliud Kipchoge ran the only |sub 2 hour| marathon in history while wearing the Nike Vaporfly NEXT%
The ZoomX foam in the Vaporfly shoes return |85%| of the energy runners put in. Previous foams returned 60-65%
In the 2019 World Marathon Majors, |31|/36 podium spots were won using the shoes
Runners wearing the Vaporfly shoes have a |74%| chance of running a personal best
In the 2019 Valencia Marathon, |95| of the first 100 finishers wore Vaporfly shoes
